    urlcolor=blue           % color of external links
}

\begin{acknowledgements}I thank my advisors, Dr. James J. Hickman and Dr. Thomas Clarke, for making this work possible.  My colleagues Kerry Wilson and Christopher Long performed many of the experiments upon which my work is based.  I enjoyed many scientific and technical discussions with Vaibhav Thakore.  I thank the Institute for Simulation and Training (IST), the I2 Lab, and the NanoScience Technology Center at the University of Central Florida for financial support.  IST also donated computing resources on the Stokes cluster. \end{acknowledgements}
